snippet: An investigation by the civil rights division of the Justice Department found that the Miami Police Department engaged in “troubling” practices and used questionable tactics.
abstract: Federal officials find that Miami Police Department engaged in pattern of excessive force that led to high number of shootings by officers, among them episodes that resulted in deaths of seven young black men over an eight-month period; findings come after two-year investigation by Justice Dept.
lead_paragraph: An investigation by the civil rights division of the Justice Department found that the Miami Police Department engaged in “troubling” practices and used questionable tactics.

headline.main: Miami Police Department Is Accused of Pattern of Excessive Force
headline.print_headline: Miami Police Are Linked To Pattern Of Force
